summary: An email from U.S. Attorney Geoffrey Berman describing a chance encounter with defense attorney Reid Weingarten at the Odeon restaurant. Weingarten indicated he may contact Berman's team early the following week for an 'interesting conversation' regarding his client (likely Jeffrey Epstein) and mentioned consulting his son, an AUSA, about the breadth of the sex trafficking statute.
